abstract: Romney calls Dodd-Frank "the biggest kiss" for "New York banks I've ever seen." | T-Mobile USA's deal for MetroPCS puts more pressure on Sprint Nextel. | Hewlett-Packard's weak stock price is increasing deal speculation. | Daniel S.
